name: Drive (Free Demo Available)
description:
Storyline

You are a bot in an extreme winter training station being trained.. to drive. How? by outrunning an avalanche and shooting your way through obstactles, in particular snow.

!WARNING!   IMPORTANT: make sure you are downloading using the itch.io app (as it is the launcher), if you do not already have the itch.io app you can get it here https://itch.io/app

Join our discord for suggestions, updates and support https://discord.gg/4aJyRDf
